ComicInfo.Title: The Special on Aisle 9; One Fine Morning at the Hospital; Groundhog Daze; Movies from Hell; Victor's Secret; One Sunday Afternoon on TV; Cracked's Truly Atrocious Trading Cards; 13 Things to Expect During the NBA Playoffs; Great Views from Your Typical Airline Coach Seat; One Fine day at the Fire Station; First Cat - the Adventures of Socks Clinton; Evilrock; TV Gameshows Through History; Banned Children's Books; Genetically Enhanced Food for the 90's; One Grey Day Last Winter; Beers
ComicInfo.Summary:
A firefighter forgets his hat and coat. The firehouse dog forgets his dalmatian skin.
Socks the cat is constantly bothered by reporters.
